treatment-md.title: Leaus Matthews & Lawrence, 2015, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Trachelostenini sensu novo: redescriptions of Trachelostenus Solier, Myrmecodema Gebien and Leaus Matthews & Lawrence, based on adults and larvae, and descriptions of three new species of Leaus (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae)
